name: Incompatible Species Episode 2: Sour Grapes
description:
It's another ho-hum day at the Exterminator office until Lucius is struck with inspiration on the heights their group could reach. Adding to that, a meeting is set with one of the biggest names in the world, Margaretta Hemsworth. Lucius plots to go into overtime to leave a lasting impression, but is his fervor leaving a mark on his subordinates partners?

This is a standalone release for the second episode of Incompatible Species: Sour Grapes. You can find the full compilation of releases up to now here: https://poxnixles.itch.io/incomspe
